TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN NETWORK <ANWI> REDUCES CUSTOMER RATES
TEXT.BODY: American Network Inc said it has reduced its long distance telephone service rates by two to 15 pct. The reductions apply to the company's subsidiaries, STARNET International Inc and American Telephone Exchange. Reuter
